actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the five-month waiting period in the disability insurance program, and for other purposes.
short_title: Social Security Fairness for the Terminally Ill Act of 2011

summary.text: Social Security Fairness for the Terminally Ill Act of 2011 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to eliminate the waiting period for disability insurance benefits for terminally ill individuals.

titles.title: Social Security Fairness for the Terminally Ill Act of 2011
To amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the five-month waiting period in the disability insurance program, and for other purposes.
